title: Finn Juhl Model 1 Chair
body: This Style Model 1 Chair by Finn Juhl, represents some of the finest characteristics of Modern Scandinavian design.The high quality of this chair can be seen in the shape of the frame and luxuriousness of the materials. The solid Ash wood frame and cotton mix upholstered (Cotton / Polyester) seat is a mixture of organic form and sculptural curves.
